scripts.export:unit1: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_SUBDIR=unit1 next build --turbopack && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const src='out',dest='docs/unit1';if(!fs.existsSync(src)){throw new Error('Missing out/ — ensure output:\'export\' in next.config.ts and rerun build');}fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});(function cp(s,d){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(s,{withFileTypes:true})){const S=p.join(s,e.name),D=p.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory()){fs.mkdirSync(D,{recursive:true});cp(S,D);}else{fs.copyFileSync(S,D);} }})(src,dest);fs.writeFileSync('docs/.nojekyll','')"
